plot: Petey's friend really wants a puppy for Christmas and he would love to get it for her. Problem is, he cannot afford the puppy, so he sends out an urgent message to Santa. Will Santa come through in time?
title: A Gift from Santa
plot_es: Petey's friend really wants a puppy for Christmas and he would love to get it for her. Problem is, he cannot afford the puppy, so he sends out an urgent message to Santa. Will Santa come through in time?
plot_en: Petey's friend really wants a puppy for Christmas and he would love to get it for her. Problem is, he cannot afford the puppy, so he sends out an urgent message to Santa. Will Santa come through in time?
